About.title: About
About.subtitle: Developer by <highlight>calling</highlight>. Systems architect by <highlight>conviction</highlight>.
About.journey_text:
My journey
I did not come to software development through a traditional academic path.
I was drawn to it by the creative freedom it offers — designing, structuring, and bringing systems to life from the ground up.

Over time, I learned to think in terms of complete products, from core logic to visual expression, building coherent and durable digital experiences.
About.vision_text:
The web should be more than an interface.
It should be robust, fluid, and intentional.

I believe in a web where architecture matters as much as appearance, and where every technical choice serves a broader vision.
